## CameraPanAnimationOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CameraPanAnimationOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [duration](./harp-map-controls.camerapananimationoptions.duration.md) | number | Duration of a whole animation in milliseconds. Defaults to <code>10</code> seconds. |
|  [easing](./harp-map-controls.camerapananimationoptions.easing.md) | [EasingFunction](./harp-map-controls.easingfunction.md) \| ((k: number) =&gt; number) | Easing function that control acceleration. Defaults to \[\[EasingFunction.Linear\]\]. |
|  [geoCoordinates](./harp-map-controls.camerapananimationoptions.geocoordinates.md) | [GeoCoordinatesLike](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinateslike.md)<!-- -->\[\] | List of positions. May be added later. |
|  [interpolation](./harp-map-controls.camerapananimationoptions.interpolation.md) | [InterpolationFunction](./harp-map-controls.interpolationfunction.md) \| ((v: number\[\], k: number) =&gt; number) | Specifies interpolation. Defaults to \[\[InterpolationFunction.Linear\]\] |
|  [repeat](./harp-map-controls.camerapananimationoptions.repeat.md) | number | Number of times the animation should be repeated. Defaults to <code>0</code>. |
